panels.description: The difference between the block timestamp + current timestamp when the metric was recorded.
panels.title: Block Latencies

targets.expr: sum by(p2p_method, p2p_role) (rate(op_node_default_p2p_req_duration_seconds_sum[1h])) / sum by(p2p_role, p2p_method) (rate(op_node_default_p2p_req_duration_seconds_count[1h]))
